Blog Post September 3, 2025

Cube made of grids of 3D balls

AI created single page WebGL 3D cube made of grids of 3D balls

So far only SuperGrok (the paid, but entry level model) and Qwen3-Coder have been able to do this visually correctly:

SuperGrok's version here

Qwen3-Coder's version here

Claude Code was less successful (wait for it...) here

So, just a bit about the ad-hoc judging criteria

  • Minor fixes were allowed (run through the same model)
  • Both Grok and Qwen3-Coder captured what I had in mind

I'm sure Claude Code would have gotten it if I gave it a bit more help.
